entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 a.m. MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
